biotools.summary: R package for topological pathway analysis integrating gene and miRNA expression profiles using validated and/or predicted miRNA-target interactions. It is based on updated versions of graphite and CliPPER Bioconductor packages dedicated to pathway analyses recently proposed by our group.

bioschemas.name: micrographite
bioschemas.summary: R package for topological pathway analysis integrating gene and miRNA expression profiles using validated and/or predicted miRNA-target interactions. It is based on updated versions of graphite and CliPPER Bioconductor packages dedicated to pathway analyses recently proposed by our group.
